snippet: The Harry Fox Agency has promoted Michael S. Simon, its senior vice president for business affairs, to chief executive, replacing Gary L. Churgin, who is leaving the organization.
abstract: The Harry Fox Agency has promoted Michael S. Simon, its senior vice president for business affairs, to chief executive, replacing Gary L. Churgin, who is leaving the organization.

headline.main: With an Eye to Digital, Music Publishing Agency Appoints a New Chief
